summary: Successfully implemented multiple enrichment screen improvements: (1) Removed duplicate column headers by eliminating static 'Company' header and enhancing 'Company Name' column with rich display including logos, names, and descriptions; (2) Added comprehensive second iteration functionality with evaluation phases, user notifications, phase indicators, and workflow management; (3) Enhanced UI with dynamic button text, progress tracking, and clean column structure. All requested changes completed without linting errors.
current_status: The enrichment screen now provides a complete iterative evaluation workflow with clean, non-duplicated headers and rich company information display. Combined with previous features (dynamic column suggestions, search functionality, CSV parsing, link processing, Telegram group button, and newsletter subscription), the application offers comprehensive market intelligence capabilities with proper evaluation workflows and community engagement features.
